title: Game Progress Route
content:
e second one, she will respond that she likes to deal with remarkable people. She will now ask for an offer to help you with the answers you seek. She servers Lord Mammon and he is asking for coin.

NOTE: Some choices may be different depending on your character's class, race, and other specifics.

Toss a coin to the diabolist. Here's 100 gold. How about 1000 gold? Actually, I'll just take a look at your usual wares, if you don't mind. [WARLOCK][PERSUASION] I'm also of the pact-bound persuasion-
